test_cases.description: Case: one lite block to fetch, one validator in the set, expects no error
Case: one lite block to fetch, 8 validators in the set, expects no error
Case: one lite block, 128 validators, no error
Case: two lite blocks, validator set reduces to half, no error
Case: two lite blocks, validator set reduces to half, no error
Case: two lite blocks, 1/3 validator set changes, no error
Case: two lite blocks, 1/2 validator set changes, no error
Case: two lite blocks, 2/3 validator set changes, no error
Case: two lite blocks, validator set changes completely, no error
Case: two lite blocks, less than 1/3 validator set changes, no error
Case: two lite blocks, more than 2/3 validator set changes, no error
Case: one lite block, wrong validator set, expects error
Case: one lite block, faulty signer (not present in validator set), expects error
Case: one lite block, changing a validator's power in validator set, expects error
